title: Ear With Hearing Aid Dark Skin Tone
description: An ear with a dark skin tone and a visible hearing aid, symbolizing hearing assistance or a hearing impairment. Can be used to represent auditory challenges or the use of assistive devices.
apple_vendor_description: The ear with a hearing aid emoji, rendered in a rich, dark skin tone on Apple devices, showcases Apple's commitment to diverse representation with lifelike detail. Its form features smooth, realistic contours, and the hearing aid itself is depicted with a subtle sheen, emphasizing its functionality. This emoji on Apple devices conveys inclusion, accessibility, and the experience of hearing, often used to communicate personal experiences or support.
